page.title: 03Shopping Locally.
page.content: There are several local shops which serve the needs of the people in the area.Civils super market is one. We decided to do a quick survey to find out about shopping trends. Most popular purchases:Bread,Butter, Eggs. Busiest day:Saturday. Many items are stocked and the store provides a cycle delivery service. 12 people work in the store which is one of a chain of local stores which are located in similar areas.People who were asked said that they found the store very handy for things they had forgotten. {1000 people visit the store daily.}
